Description: identification of a settlement processing based on settlement trigger; one job_id can incur multiple group_ids with adjustment run
identification of a settlement processing based from settlement-ready meter data
identification used by BSMD to identify direct participants billable to WESM
end date of the billing period; usually on the 25th of the current month
start date of the billing period; usually on the 26th of last month
equivalent amount with respect to set price and quantity
identification for each settlement or billing calculation; used in AMS INV and MF files.
